title: Hit and Run
author: Johnstone, Doug
snippet: The bell for last orders rang just as he stepped through the door of The Montague. He drew stares from the regulars and off-duty cops.

title: Hit and Run
author: Johnstone, Doug
snippet: He'd never been in The Montague before, despite living round the corner. In a neighbourhood awash with students on happy hour, it was a dull grey old man's pub, populated by halfway jakeys and off-duty coppers from St Leonard's across the road.

title: Hit and Run
author: Johnstone, Doug
snippet: 'Good. How about The Montague in half an hour?'
